application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: Planning permission Ref: 163523FUL dated 01/12/2016 required development to be commenced within 3 years of that date but no pre-commencement conditions have been discharged in that period and no evidence has been submitted to indicate that this permission remains extant. This application to discharge condition 5 is therefore not considered to comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990.
description: Submission of site contamination assessments and remediation pursuant to condition 5 of planning application Ref: 163523FUL  dated 01/12/2016 for 'Construction of two semi-detached two storey (2x2 bed self-contained) dwellinghouses with associated on-site refuse storage and amenity space (following demolition of the existing structure)'
